title: Integrating disabled children into regular schools (TEFC)
creator_credit: Joe Dora and Chisholm Institute of Technology. School of Education
brief_description: Integrating disabled children into mainstream schools throughout Australia requires careful thought and action on the part of the disabled, their parents, teachers and all concerned. This video presents the thoughts of these people in discrete segments suitable for discussion.
